catalog_script_client.name: FilterRooms

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_0f4d710d839552108c5d91d6feaad3fe
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Room Request w/ iSemble">95c3ce7883d112108c5d91d6feaad3ce</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:60e3c2b883d112108c5d91d6feaad32b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>FilterRooms</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   // Assuming 'room' is the name of the reference field you want to filter
   var capacity = g_form.getValue('capacity'); // Get the current capacity value

   // Use GlideAjax to call a script include to filter the records
   var ga = new GlideAjax('FilterRooms'); // Replace with your script include name
   ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'filterRooms');
   ga.addParam('sysparm_capacity', capacity);
   ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
      var filteredOptions = JSON.parse(response);
      g_form.clearOptions('room'); // Clear existing options
      filteredOptions.forEach(function(option) {
         g_form.addOption('room', option.sys_id, option.display_value); // Add filtered options
      });
   });
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-15 15:46:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f4d710d839552108c5d91d6feaad3fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FilterRooms</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="iSemble" source="x_1394569_isemble">bb5b608883c55210ffcebfc6feaad363</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="iSemble">bb5b608883c55210ffcebfc6feaad363</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0f4d710d839552108c5d91d6feaad3fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-15 17:35:59</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
